question: 11612- would it be sufficient to just gargle the mouth and clean nostrils or does one have to do a full wudhu,
answer:
QUESTION
Regarding your answer to question 11612, point no 3, would it be sufficient to just gargle the mouth and clean nostrils or does one have to do a full wudhu, considering the fact that one is still going to wash the entire body as in point no.4. Wasalaam
ANSWER


Share:
It is Mustahabb to perform the full Wudhu before Ghusl.

and Allah Ta'ala Knows Best

Mufti Ebrahim Desai
